name: Jr Esqueda
text: Super good. Staff is really polite. Definitely recommend

name: Jonathan Mendez
text: GREAT service! Was offered to try a slice for free while my family and I waited for a really good thin crust pizza! Guys were down to earth, friendly people. I plan to come back again and often.

name: SUNNY
text: This pizza store it very clean food was great and it nearby AMC which great. But the price seems little high for me for 2 slices of pizza and drink round $8. But still people should try out this pizza store.

name: denny abraham
text: I often used to have lunch here. Small but wonderful place. People here are friendly and pizzas are also good.

name: Chloe Wong
text: Love that zpizza uses organic ingredients and that they have vegan ingredients. We got the Berkeley Vegan which tasted amazing. They definitely do not skimp out on the toppings, our pizza had tons of veggies on top. When we checked in there ‚Ä¶More

name: Kirk Howie
text: Yummy. They have selections for people with allergies.

name: Connie Smith
text: Delicious. Just pretty please make your "pizza salad" with yummy califlower crust ‚ù£Ô∏è in more than the 1 size and you got 100% approved from me!!!‚ù£Ô∏è‚ù£Ô∏è‚ù£Ô∏èüíìüíìüíìüòéüòéüòé

name: Mary Reggiatore
text: Stopped by the other day and decided to try the Turkey sandwich, my friend had the Arugula salad.  What a way to start the holiday season.  Cranberries on my turkey sandwich, delicious. As we all know the bread can make or break a sandwich ‚Ä¶More

name: Jim Pasala
text: I work in the area and needed a fast solution for a team lunch and I called this place.  Great delivery on short notice.  I was even given a discount for my first time having this delivered. Pizza was more unique over traditional brands and side dishes were good too.

name: Joni Gonzales
text: Zpizza in Glendora changed ownership.  It is  by far not as good as it used to be.....I used to buy the  yuppy/veggi sandwich-  I wont be going back....

name: Robert Speranza
text:
Great beer selection
Pizza surprisingly delicious
Clean inside, mirrors in restroom ‚Ä¶More

name: Jason
text:
Well, we love z-pizza but we'll be making the drive to the location in Upland.

For months we've been picking up z-pizza each Monday afternoon for our family. ‚Ä¶More

name: Adan De Loera
text: I love the food, pizza and sandwiches are few of many good food here

name: Anthony G
text: I've never had a horrible pizza from anywhere . But I got the pepperoni pizza and it was not that good. I wanted to try something different then dominos for delivery and it was not that great. The wings were horrible though I got the basil ‚Ä¶More

name: TSDF Army
text: Great food, although it does take about 15 minutes to serve you if you plan on eating a individual pizza. Menu is packed with options, store is usually not packed, and employees are very friendly.

name: Brendan Nugent
text:
I love the Rustica Pizza''s they have on their menu!
The pizza is way different then pizza hut and dominos... You can taste the difference in tomato... sounds weird but it feels like you are eating a cleaner pizza!

name: Pablo Cravacuore
text: Really good pizza for being a chain. They use good ingredients and it shows.

name: Andrea Marie Boisclair
text: Delicious and they are verrry nice there.

name: Julian Teal
text: This Zpizza is very good. I love it :)

name: Linn Neidengard
text: Thin crust great service. Check their daily specials.

name: Monique Beltran
text: Yummie pizza

name: Mindy Anne
text: Best vegan pizza around!

name: mark Lopez
text: Great GF pizza
